name: Nikhil Gupta 0008
content: Nikhil GuptaSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationNikhil GuptaAssistant Professor (Tenure-Track),Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology (IIIT) Delhi.E-mail: first name at iiitd dot ac dot in       Phone: 011-26907417     Curriculum VitaeI am an assistant professor (tenure-track) in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology (IIIT) Delhi. Before this,  I was a postdoc in the Department of Computer Science at Boston College under the guidance of Prof. Ilya Volkovich. I obtained my Ph.D.  from the Indian Institute of Science Bangalore, where I was very fortunate to be advised by Prof. Chandan Saha. My research interests lie broadly in theoretical computer science, specifically algebraic complexity theory.  Google SitesReport abusePage detailsPage updated Google SitesReport abuse
